item.title: SmartList Builder and SQL Tables/Views
item.description: Many of you may already know this, but I encountered a problem this week deploying a SmartList Builder item. Here’s what happened: I created two SQL views based on GP and custom tables. I granted the SmartList Builder access to these views (Tools » SmartList Builder » Security » SQL Table Security). I created my SmartList (Tools » SmartList Builder » SmartList Builder). After testing, the SmartList worked correctly. I deployed the views to the client’s environment.
